output:
> After purchasing FileBot via Paddle, you will receive 2 emails`. The first email from `help@paddle.com` will contain your license as plain text. The second email from `license@filebot.net` will contain your license as file attachment. Either one can be used to activate FileBot.
ðŸ“˜ https://www.filebot.net/activate.html

> If you want to recover a lost license key or a never received license key, please contact Paddle with your name, email and payment details so they can look up your order and resend your license confirmation. If you have multiple purchases under your email address, then you must include payment details so that they can look up your most recent order.
ðŸ“˜ https://www.filebot.net/activate.html
ðŸ“˜ https://www.filebot.net/contact/paddle.html

> If you have received no email at all then you have likely mistyped your email address or your mail server is rejecting emails. In this case, please contact Paddle (our payment processor) with your payment details so they can help you look up your order number and resend your license.
https://www.filebot.net/activate.html
Batch Rename any type of file: https://www.filebot.net/forums/viewtopic.php?f=3&t=2072

Add Blacklisted Terms and Improve Movie / Series Detection: https://www.filebot.net/forums/viewtopic.php?f=3&t=359

Exclude Blacklist & Series-Mappings: https://www.filebot.net/forums/viewtopic.php?f=3&t=360
Latest Beta Revisions and Release Candidates: https://www.filebot.net/forums/viewtopic.php?f=7&t=1609

Format Expresssions: https://www.filebot.net/naming.html
Predefined format expressions: https://www.filebot.net/forums/viewtopic.php?f=5&t=2
How to install FileBot (portable) on Linux / FreeBSD / Solaris / any Unix OS: https://www.filebot.net/forums/viewtopic.php?t=6057
@file syntax for reading cmdline args from text files: https://www.filebot.net/forums/viewtopic.php?t=3244
Revert files via the internal History: https://www.filebot.net/forums/viewtopic.php?t=12133

GUI: Press F5 and click the infomation symbol
CLI: `filebot -script fn:sysinfo`
License Error: Banned due to abuse: https://www.filebot.net/forums/viewtopic.php?t=9594
How to process only specific kinds of files?: https://www.filebot.net/forums/viewtopic.php?t=4222
